titleStmt.title: Die Sabbathi 8 Julii 1648. Ordered by the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, that on the next Lords day publique thanks be given to almighty God, in all churches within the city of London, and late lines of communication, for his great mercy in giving the Parliaments forces a great victory in the north...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Wright, at the Kings Head in the Old Bayley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Kings Head in the Old Bayley
